title: 3 Neuroscientists To Share Nobel Prize In Physiology Or Medicine
teaser: The $1.1 million prize will be split between John O'Keefe of University College in London and a husband-and-wife team, May-Britt and Edvard Moser of the Norwegian University in Trondheim.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
